content_html: Former US President Donald Trump is filing a lawsuit against The New York Times, demanding $1.5 billion in compensation. He accuses the newspaper of defaming and disrespecting him by consistently publishing false information. Trump stated on his social media platform, Truth Social, that the newspaper's actions mu
